name: Wild tribes
introduction: Hi weak one ! What you see here is but a fraction of our forces !
declaringWar: Be ready to be annhilated, your cities taken, your gold pillaged and your civilians enslaved !
attacked: You are not attacking us, we are attacking you, don't be mistaken !
afterPeace: This shouldn't happen, we are a nation forever at war !
defeated: This is the end of the dark ages, no more will wild freedom roams this land, now tamed by the forces of order
neutralHello: Be ready for our fury, you, your wives and your children won't be spared.
hateHello: Be ready for our fury, you, your wives and your children won't be spared.
tradeRequest: Trade ? Are you joking ? But you are welcome to deliver your tribute.
uniques: [+25]% Strength <for [Military] units> <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
[+50]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities]
